meanings.definition: Used to indicate a function or purpose
meanings.sent1: I use a spoon as a tool to eat soup.
meanings.sent2: She works as a teacher at the school.
meanings.sent3: He tried to use a shoe as a phone, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The umbrella acted as a shield against the rain.
meanings.sent5: The key served as a solution to the locked door.

meanings.definition: In the same way or manner
meanings.sent1: She sings as beautifully as a bird.
meanings.sent2: He runs as fast as a cheetah.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed as if asking for food.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled as if angry at the trees.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed as smoothly as silk.

meanings.definition: In the role or function of
meanings.sent1: He will act as the leader of the team.
meanings.sent2: She dressed as a pirate for the costume party.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked as the protector of the house.
meanings.sent4: The actor performed as the villain in the play.
meanings.sent5: The candle served as the source of light in the dark room.

meanings.definition: To the same degree or extent
meanings.sent1: She loves him as much as she loves ice cream.
meanings.sent2: He worries about his grades as his parents do.
meanings.sent3: The tree grew as tall as the house.
meanings.sent4: The river flooded as high as the bridge.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone as brightly as a diamond.
